functions.php

Bootstrapping functions, essential and needed for Anax to work together with some common helpers.

Package
\Default

Tags

None found

Functions

t()

t(string  $str, array  $args = array()) : string

i18n, internationalization, send all strings though this function to enable i18n. Inspired by Drupal´s t()-function.

Parameters

string $str

the string to check up for translation.
array $args

associative array with arguments to be replaced in the str.

  • !variable: Inserted as is. Use this for text that has already been sanitized.
  • @variable: Escaped to HTML using htmlEnt(). Use this for anything displayed on a page on the site.

Returns

string —

the translated string.

File
functions.php

Tags

package

Default

mergesort()

mergesort(  $array, callable  $cmp_function) : void

Sort array but maintain index when compared items are equal.

http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.usort.php#38827

Parameters

$array
callable $cmp_function

custom function to compare values

File
functions.php

Tags

package

Default

glob_recursive()

glob_recursive(string  $pattern, integer  $flags) : void

Glob recursivly.

http://in.php.net/manual/en/function.glob.php#106595

Parameters

string $pattern

pattern to search for
integer $flags

flags to use, as in glob()
